TopicTitle: How I got cut three times

Articles.Content:
I left for a wedding reception completely fine.

I returned cut by glass 3 times.

So how did this happen, You ask?

Here's the story: I was sitting around when I noticed others ringing their glass...bottles? Containers? I don't know. I only had a spoon, So I used that. For a few seconds I did get to ring...But then,

SMASH!!!

I'm bleeding! Get me bandages!
Help! Get bandages!

I'm bleeding!

For around 5 minutes I was saying I was bleeding but only after 5 minutes did I finally get a Band-Aids.

around 20 minutes later I started bleeding again...Another 5 minutes wasted waiting for Band-Aids.

So that's the story of how I got cut by glass 3 times.

Ouch.
*cough* That only counts as one  *cough*.     Hope you're doing ok, no permanent damage I hope?

23 minutes ago, Gargamel said:

*cough* That only counts as one  *cough*.     Hope you're doing ok, no permanent damage I hope?

 

I should have mentioned I got 3 small cuts on 3 fingers.
